quality.reason: The rooms are elegant and well-maintained, reflecting historic charm, though some guests noted limited views and exclusivity concerns.

location.reason: Situated in the heart of Philadelphia, it offers convenient access to major attractions and is an architectural gem.

service.reason: Service is professional and attentive, but occasional inconsistencies and exclusivity perceptions were noted.

safety.reason: Located in a safe area with well-secured premises, ensuring a controlled and professional environment.
